article.title: Architectures for quantum simulation showing a quantum speedup

multiple_choice_question.text: Which architecture(s) use(s) an initial state with rotation angle βi = π/8 (crimson)?
What type of measurement is performed on the qubits with thin borders (even sites)?
choices: D) A combination of Z, X, and Xπ/4

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the parameter θ represent in the initial state preparation?
choices: A) The probability of preparing a qubit in state |1⟩
B) The rotation angle applied to each qubit
C) The number of qubits in the lattice
D) The coupling strength between qubits

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the term Z(πa, π/4 b+β) represent?
choices: A) The output probability of the quantum simulation
B) The partition function of a random Ising model
C) The energy of the final resource state
D) The fidelity of the state preparation
